plot outline: A Dangerous and Psychopathic man is created in India by using the clone of the former brutal German ruler Sir. Adolf Hitler. He was designed to destroy the world by using his criminal psychopathic mind. Is there any chance to rescue the world from him? Watch this evergreen classical thriller to know more about.
title: Kalachakram
plot: To destroy the country, a businessman with the help of a doctor creates a clone of Adolf Hitler. However, a group of youngsters are determined to expose him to the public.

A Dangerous and Psychopathic man is created in India by using the clone of the former brutal German ruler Sir. Adolf Hitler. He was designed to destroy the world by using his criminal psychopathic mind. Is there any chance to rescue the world from him? Watch this evergreen classical thriller to know more about.
